function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of LDA algorithm on COVID-19 public media dataset","Impact":"Misinterpretation of topics, leading to misinformation","Mitigation":"Validation of results by domain experts","Technologies":"LDA algorithm, Gensim package","People":"Public, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, domain experts"},{"Description":"Download and import of stop words from NLTK library","Impact":"Incorrect text preprocessing, leading to biased results","Mitigation":"Manual review of stop word list, validation of preprocessing results","Technologies":"NLTK library","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Researchers, data scientists"},{"Description":"Use of core packages in Python for text processing and visualization","Impact":"Inaccurate data preprocessing, leading to skewed analysis","Mitigation":"Thorough testing of packages, validation of lemmatization and visualization results","Technologies":"Python, genism, spacy, PyLDAvis","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Researchers, data scientists"}]}
